mainCard.title: The power of authentic conversation
mainCard.paragraph1: Research by Mallory et al. (2022) showed that open communication in the intimate sphere significantly increases relationship satisfaction. Regular dialogues about needs and fantasies allow partners to build lasting emotional bonds.
mainCard.paragraph2: Secret Sparks facilitates these conversations, enabling safe sharing of desires and discovering common interests without fear of misunderstandings. It's an effective way to deepen mutual understanding and build an intimate relationship based on authentic communication.

sideCard.title: Communication and desire
sideCard.description: A study by Montesi et al. (2011) proved that honest conversation about sex enhances satisfaction and bond. Secret Sparks facilitates such dialogue through anonymous surveys and personalized reports that identify common interests without pressuring partners, leading to a deeper and more satisfying relationship.

feature1.title: Hormones of closeness
feature1.description: Feldman et al. (2012) showed that frequent physical contact increases oxytocin levels, strengthening trust and sense of security in a relationship. Secret Sparks offers rituals and activity suggestions that promote the production of this "love hormone" and build lasting attachment.

feature2.title: Satisfaction and happiness
feature2.description: Schmiedeberg et al. (2017) demonstrated a significant relationship between frequency of intercourse and overall feeling of happiness and life satisfaction. Secret Sparks inspires the discovery of new sensations and maintaining enthusiasm in a relationship, which directly translates to overall life satisfaction.

feature3.title: Balance in relationship
feature3.description: Gola's study (2019) indicates that higher sexual satisfaction promotes better well-being and increases the level of commitment in a relationship. Secret Sparks helps couples better understand each other's needs and desires, leading to balance and harmony in an intimate relationship.

whatIs.title: What is Secret Sparks?
whatIs.description: Secret Sparks is an application created for couples who want to safely and discreetly explore new areas of their intimate life. Each partner completes a short, anonymous questionnaire – ensuring that no personal answers are shared with the other person. Secret AI analyzes sexual preferences, relationship map, and then presents a personalized report and practical suggestions on how to improve your sex life.

step1.title: Complete the survey
step1.description: Each partner individually completes the survey, rating on a scale from 1 to 4 their excitement and willingness to compromise with various types of intimate activities.

step2.title: Invite your partner
step2.description: After completing the survey, you'll receive a link to send to your partner so they can complete their part. This enables Secret AI to create the report.

step3.title: Receive your report
step3.description: After both surveys are completed, you'll receive a report with an analysis of your sex life and suggestions. It only includes activities that both of you are interested in.

step4.title: Rediscover sex
step4.description: Consider this as a starting point to diversify your intimate life. By implementing the suggestions from the report, you can raise the level of satisfaction and closeness in your relationship.

gameLevels.title: Game levels
gameLevels.description: Secret Sparks offers three levels of advancement, tailored to your preferences and readiness to explore:

discover.title: Discover
discover.description: For couples who want to discover basic fantasies and diversify their intimate relationship.

explore.title: Explore
explore.description: For couples who are ready for deeper exploration of their fantasies and desires.

exceed.title: Exceed
exceed.description: For brave couples who want to push boundaries and discover unusual experiences.

question1.question: Will my partner see my answers?
question1.answer: No, your individual answers remain completely private. Your partner will never see your specific choices. In the report, we only present common areas of interest, without revealing individual preferences.

question2.question: How long does it take to complete the survey?
question2.answer: Completing the survey takes an average of 5-10 minutes. It depends on the chosen level (Discover, Explore, or Exceed) and how much time you spend considering each question. It's worth dedicating appropriate time to this task to get the most precise results.

question3.question: Can I change my answers after saving them?
question3.answer: Yes, while filling out the survey you can freely go back to previous questions and change your answers. However, after completing the survey and generating the report, the answers are locked and cannot be changed. In case of need, you can always fill out a new survey.

question4.question: How long do I have access to the report?
question4.answer: After generating the report, you have unlimited access to it. The report is sent to the provided email address, so you can return to it whenever you want. For your security and privacy, all survey data is deleted from our servers 7 days after generating the report, but the report itself remains available to you.

question1.question: Will my partner see my answers from the survey?
question1.answer: Absolutely not. Secret Sparks guarantees complete anonymity and privacy of your answers. Your partner will never see your individual choices - only those activities that you both rated positively will be available. This way, you can be completely honest in your answers without fear of judgment or pressure.

question2.question: How long do you store my data?
question2.answer: We care about your privacy. All survey data is automatically deleted from our servers 7 days after generating the report. We don't store data longer than necessary to provide the service. The report itself is sent to your email address, giving you permanent access to it.

question3.question: Are my answers secure?
question3.answer: Yes, all data is encrypted and stored with the highest security standards. We use end-to-end encryption, and our infrastructure is regularly tested for security. We never share your data with third parties or use it for marketing purposes without your consent.

question1.question: What will I find in the Secret Sparks report?
question1.answer: The Secret Sparks report includes: an analysis of your common preferences, a map of compatibility and diversity in your approach to sexuality, specific scenarios and activities that can enhance your intimate closeness, and practical tips on how to implement them. The report is completely personalized - based solely on your shared interests.

question2.question: What if my preferences don't match my partner's?
question2.answer: This is completely normal - every couple has differences in preferences. Secret Sparks focuses on areas where your interests meet, even if there are few. In such cases, the report will focus on these common points and suggest ways to develop that part of your intimate life. Sometimes discovering even a few common areas can open a completely new chapter in the relationship.

question3.question: How long does it take to complete the survey?
question3.answer: Completing the survey takes an average of 5-10 minutes, depending on the chosen level (Discover, Explore, or Exceed). There is no time limit; you can take as long as you need to think about each question. We recommend finding a quiet moment when no one is disturbing you so that your answers can be as honest and thoughtful as possible.

question4.question: Can I pause the survey and finish it later?
question4.answer: Yes, you can pause the survey at any time and come back to it later. Your answers are automatically saved after each question. Simply use the same device and browser to continue from where you left off.

question1.question: How much does Secret Sparks cost and what does the price include?
question1.answer: Secret Sparks is a one-time fee of $7.99. The price includes access to the survey for both partners, generation of a personalized report, and permanent access to the results. There are no hidden fees or subscriptions - you pay once and use the full functionality.

question2.question: What payment methods are accepted?
question2.answer: We accept various payment methods, including: credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard), BLIK (in Poland), online transfers through most banks, and electronic wallets (Google Pay, Apple Pay). All payments are secure and encrypted.

question3.question: What happens if my partner doesn't complete their survey?
question3.answer: To generate a report, both partners must complete the survey. If your partner doesn't complete their part, the report won't be generated. In such a case, you can resend the invitation or contact our support team, who will help resolve the issue. Your payment is valid for 30 days, which gives both partners enough time to complete the survey.

question4.question: Do you offer refunds?
question4.answer: Due to the digital nature of our product, we generally don't offer refunds after purchase and report generation. However, if you have technical issues or the report was not generated due to a system error, please contact our support team - we will review each case individually and try to find a satisfactory solution.

question1.question: Can I complete the survey without a partner?
question1.answer: Yes, you can complete your part of the survey on your own. However, to receive a full, personalized report, your partner also needs to complete their part. If you're not currently in a relationship, you can visit our site when you're ready for a shared experience.

question2.question: Is Secret Sparks suitable for LGBT+ couples?
question2.answer: Yes, Secret Sparks is designed with all types of couples in mind. Our surveys and reports are created in an inclusive and gender-neutral way so that every couple can find valuable guidance for their relationship. During configuration, you can select the appropriate gender preferences.

question3.question: Can I use Secret Sparks as a gift for my partner?
question3.answer: Absolutely! Secret Sparks is an excellent and original gift for couples - for anniversaries, Valentine's Day, or just because. When ordering, you can choose the "wrap as a gift" option to receive a special code and instructions on how to give this unique adventure to your partner.

question4.question: How can I contact the support team?
question4.answer: Our support team is available at the email address: contact@secretsparks.com. We usually respond within 24 hours on business days. In your message, please provide the email address that was used for the purchase (if applicable) to identify your order more quickly.

securityPage.title: Security and privacy
securityPage.subtitle: Your trust and privacy are our top priorities. Learn about our security measures.

dataProtection.title: Data protection
dataProtection.description: How we protect your personal data and survey responses
dataProtection.point1: Database is encrypted, and transmission occurs through SSL connection
dataProtection.point2: Responses are encrypted and not linked to your personal data
dataProtection.point3: We securely send you the report and don't store its contents long-term

uniqueTokens.title: Unique tokens
uniqueTokens.description: Secure invitation system for your partner
uniqueTokens.point1: One-time links with tokens for partners
uniqueTokens.point2: No possibility to access the survey without a valid token

whatData.title: What data do we collect?
whatData.description: We only collect data that is essential for the application to function: your and your partner's name/pseudonym, email addresses, survey question responses, and game level preferences. We do not collect personal data such as last name, address, or national ID.

howWeUse.title: How do we use the data?
howWeUse.description: We use the collected data exclusively for:
howWeUse.point1: Generating a personalized report for you and your partner
howWeUse.point2: Improving the quality of our services and product development
howWeUse.point3: Anonymous statistical analyses (without the ability to identify individuals)

weDoNotShare.title: We do not share data
weDoNotShare.description: We do not share your personal data or survey responses with third parties. Your responses are visible only to you; even your partner won't see them.

transmissionSecurity.title: Transmission security
transmissionSecurity.description: All connections to our application are encrypted using HTTPS protocol. We use security headers such as Content-Security-Policy, X-Content-Type-Options, and others to protect against XSS and clickjacking attacks.

anonymity.title: Anonymity
anonymity.description: We don't require login or full personal data. You can use pseudonyms for yourself and your partner.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: Our database has implemented security procedures, is encrypted, and we don't link responses with personal data.

reporting.title: Reporting issues
reporting.description: Noticed a security vulnerability? Contact us immediately at: contact@secretsparks.pl
